SEARCH
Package org.example.entity

Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
org.example.entity.Medicine
public class Medicine extends Object
Represents a medicine with details about its name, stock level, and stock thresholds for inventory management.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String name, int stockLevel, int lowThreshold, int highThreshold)
      Constructor to initialize a medicine object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine
      stockLevel - the current stock level of the medicine
      lowThreshold - the stock level below which the medicine is considered low
      highThreshold - the stock level above which the medicine is considered overstocked

      public boolean isLowStock()
      Checks if the stock level is below the low threshold.
      Returns:
